Articles.Content:
Two stage landing vehicle with 30t mass, six engines and crew of three Kerbals.

Uploaded with ImageShack.us
Uh... how much of those two tanks did you use to land? I just re-designed mine with one of those tanks, and four radial engines.

Not much

Used the first tank to land and also for start on mun up to about 200km where i decoupled first stage (an fell back to mun) an then about 30% of the second stage for flight back to Kerbal.

A little bit complex was the fuel hose installation for feeding into the upper stage...want go in one piece around the decoupler - hat to install two lines...but it worked.

Not much

Used the first tank to land and also for start on mun up to about 200km where i decoupled first stage (an fell back to mun) an then about 30% of the second stage for flight back to Kerbal.

A little bit complex was the fuel hose installation for feeding into the upper stage...want go in one piece around the decoupler - hat to install two lines...but it worked.

Works for me. I am not going to attempt a return just yet, so it sounds like I have sufficient fuel.

I did it!
